sources.title: Equinox Flower
sources.description: Later in his career, Ozu started becoming increasingly sympathetic with the younger generation, a shift that was cemented in  Equinox Flower,  his gorgeously detailed first color film, about an old-fashioned father and his newfangled daughter.

metadata.Plot: A business man is often approached by friends for advice and help regarding marriage as well as family and romantic relationships. He is always very calmly and objectively able to give great insight and assistance to these particular situations. However, when it comes time for him to be objective regarding his oldest daughter, he finds it very difficult...
metadata.Writer: Ton Satomi, Yasujirô Ozu, Kôgo Noda
metadata.Actors: Shin Saburi, Kinuyo Tanaka, Ineko Arima
